Class NewYorkStylePizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pr4.NewYorkStylePizzaController
public class NewYorkStylePizzaController extends Object
This class is the controller for NewYorkStylePizzaView.
Author:
Ryan S. Lee, Songyuan Zhang

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainViewController mainViewController)
      This method initializes the NewYorkStylePizzaView.
      Parameters:
      mainViewController - the controller to use MainViewController methods in this controller.

    • makePizza

      public void makePizza()
      This method makes the pizza for selected options and update the price and corresponding details.

    • changeImage

      private void changeImage()
      This method changes the image with the selected flavor.

    • adjustTopping

      public void adjustTopping(int index)
      This method adjusts the list of toppings to be included for the flavor.
      Parameters:
      index - Flavor of the pizza.

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Add the topping for the pizza. It will be only used for BYO pizza. It will check if the number of the toppings does not exceed the 7.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - It recognizes if the user click the add topping button.

    • removeTopping

      public void removeTopping(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Remove the topping for the pizza. It will be only used for BYO pizza.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - It recognizes if the user click the remove topping button.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Add the selected pizza to the order. It will check if the pizza is not selected properly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - It recognizes if the user click the Add to Order button.
